about_the_game:
The Kingdom of Light is in trouble, and only its greatest Heroes can help!
Lenz is a kind and brave young man who fights in the name of his Kingdom! Upon finding a letter from King Nicolas at his friend Sky's house, he immediately leaves for the castle, but little did he know what awaited him there...

▪️ Live the most vibrant Adventures in this world full of surprises!

▪️ Fight for your life against the most diverse creatures.

▪️ Engaging story showing each side of the characters.

▪️ Official Theme Track sung by The Kira Justice.

▪️ Use your RPG knowledge to beat your enemies!

The game "A Hero's Legacy" is an indie action-adventure RPG style game. As it is a semi-open world, the player has several places to explore. In the game, you can walk, run, jump (at certain times) and interact with the scenery and the NPCs themselves. As you play, you will learn more about the characters' stories and their mysteries.
